name: Wedding Budget Tracker
description: For couples planning a wedding, this tracker helps manage the costs associated with the big day, including venue, catering, attire, and more.Are you looking to automate PDF generation for repetitive documents like invoices, agreements, contracts, certificates, reports, letters etc?PDFOutput helps automate PDF generation for documents using Notion Database and a Google Doc!No Coding Required, No Technical Skills Needed, Just One-Click Automation!It requires 2 things: Google Doc Template: A templa
features: Google Doc Template: A template file with placeholders in {{...}} format (e.g.,{{InvoiceNumber}},{{ClientName}}).; Notion Database: Acts as a database with matching headers likeClientName,InvoiceDatefor seamless placeholder mapping.; View all your Wedding Event Expenses in one glance.; Add your own categories of event expenses such asVenue and Food Expenses, Attire Expenses and Entertainment Expenses etcas per your requirement to track each wedding event related expenses.; Set budget for each category of expense to ensure spending within the budgeted amount.; Get a complete summary of all expenses incurred so as to spend within thebudgeted amountfor each head of expense.
